newsitem.title: USA: Acordia sees few changes from Anthem deal.
newsitem.headline: Acordia sees few changes from Anthem deal.

text.p: Acordia Inc chief financial officer Keith Maib said the company anticipates few changes in its operations following a proposed takeover by majority shareholder Anthem Inc.
Maib declined to comment on the timeframe for a potential deal to sell Acordia's brokerage business. It earlier said that previously-announced discussions are continuing.
Anthem, which already holds a 66.8 percent stake in Acordia, earlier Monday said it had struck an agreement to buy the rest of the company's shares for $40 each.
